subtopic.name: Area Of The Triangle Formed By Three Points
information: x<sub><small>1</small></sub> & y<sub><small>1</small></sub> are coordinates of the first point
x<sub><small>2</small></sub> & y<sub><small>2</small></sub> are coordinates of the second point
x<sub><small>3</small></sub> & y<sub><small>3</small></sub> are coordinates of the third point
A is the area of the Triangle formed by these 3 Points
If A = 0, Then these 3 Points are colinear
